fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Backstabber: Whenever you open a channel with someone, you may choose to deal 2 HP of Unblockable damage to them at the end of the phase.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Steal: Snatch?! a player. [2 uses, 3 CD]
- Backdoor: Give a Chaos member a non-special card of your choice. [3 uses, 1 CD]
- Sow: Pick a player. The next time they learn something, it will be incorrect. Affects up to Susceptible checks. [3 uses, 2 CD]
- Misinformation: Send a host message of your choice to the action log or to a playerâ€™s private channel. Nothing will actually happen with the message, however players can interact with it as if it were real. [4 uses, 1 CD, Astral, Graveyard]
